title.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XVII, No. 8, Feb. 19, 1913. Cw Dniach Nedzy I Zbrodni, (In the Days of Misery and Crime)

div.bibl: Narod Polski, Vol. XVII, No. 8, Feb. 19, 1913. CW DNIACH NEDZY I ZBRODNI, (IN THE DAYS OF MISERY AND CRIME)

body.p: This is the title of an extremely sensational novel, based on the life of the Poles in America.

It was printed in Poland several times, and was very well liked everywhere. In it is described the life of Czolgosz, the murder, of President McKinley, and also the sad end of the famous "Army of Rybakowski." It has 295 pages. The price is 50 cents. Address direct to author, Stanislaus Osada, 1115 N. Leavitt St., Chicago.
